events.message: I have just been involved in a car collision at an intersection and need to file a claim immediately.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident due to damages to the vehicle from the collision.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist you through the claims process and gather necessary information.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and are starting the procedures to support you as soon as possible.
Please provide your vehicle registration, police report, and photos of the collision damage to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents including police report, photos, and vehicle registration have been submitted for review.
Our claims investigation team has started reviewing the details and evidence related to your auto accident claim.
The investigation is now complete, confirming the circumstances of the accident and the extent of vehicle damage.
We have prepared a settlement offer based on the investigation findings and damage assessment of your vehicle.
Thank you for your response regarding the settlement; we appreciate your cooperation and feedback.
Your claim has been approved in full, and we are preparing to issue the payment for the repair costs.
The payment to cover the vehicle repairs after the auto accident has been issued to your designated bank account.
Your auto accident claim is now officially closed. Please contact us if you have any further questions or concerns.
The documentation and records for your auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
